trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Lansing
There were no other sightings in Lansing on or around September 20th 2008
divs: sighting detailsi'm a field investigator for mufon. without going into long history, i've had a few encounters which has led me to into research and then into investigations. please note the person in the following electrical event i'm submitting below is the same house i witnessed and the other investigator witnessed and photographed please see case no. 5311 and 5318. electrical happenings.... 6 witnesses in total. on sat sept 20, 2008 a field investigator friend of mine had been trying to get a hold of me on both my house and cell. she had her daughter text my daughter that it urgent i contact her, which i did right away. she was obviously stirred up by the tone in her voice and told me that there were a couple flashes of light out her windows and a few seconds later the electic in her house was going crazy. right away i drove to her home where i witnessed flickering and zapping going on with her front porch lights. she had her kids and their friends outside as i met her in the driveway. from there we went in the house and down into the basement to the circuit breaker box. it was a bit unsetteling because of the lights and i could hear buzzing, zapping, snapping...like the sound downed power lines make when touching. i honestly thought she was having shorts in her wiring as i'm following her through the room to the circuit box. now at the box, i could hear the same zapping and buzzing coming from the wall all around it. she didn���t want to open the box, so i did. there was nothing, no sparks, no fire, no burnt smell, nothing. it all looked normal. she had said earlier she called the power emergency line and they didn���t answer so then she called 911 and then 911 called her back as we were standing there in the basement and told her that they had other numbers for the power co. and finally got a hold of someone and were sending them out. the light flickering and buzzing\snapping continued as we walked around her basement. a few moments later when i was standing by her back door in the other room of the basement i seen a flash of bright light from outside her door window. i then stepped outside and we stood for a little bit looking around trying to determine where the flash of light came from. at around 10:30 pm the guy from the power co. shows up and the electrical activity had already died down. he checked her basement, the entire house, the garage, all outside her home, the poles, everything...he even put a monitor on her circuit breaker. he was at her house for close to 3 hours checking everything, including the poles and wires up and down the road she lives on. i stayed with her for a little bit longer after he left and then i left myself. i think i got home around 1:30am. after i was home for a bit she texted me again saying that its starting again. the power guy found nothing wrong with anything inside or outside her home. he was very professional and did a very through job on checking everything. he found nothing, yet with what i was seeing and hearing his findings didn't make sense to me. her house absolutely had electricity zapping and snapping within it.
